name: Fashion Magazine Cover: Crimson Palace in Snow

chinese: 提示词1：简洁

使用我上传的人脸作为绝对基准来生成图片，图片描述如下：A high-fashion photograph styled as a VOGUE magazine cover, set in a snow-covered corridor of the Forbidden City with red pillars. The central subject is a beautiful young East Asian woman with a fair, bright porcelain complexion and a very subtle, restrained elegant smile (closed mouth). She has a refined face, dark expressive eyes, and a graceful demeanor. She is wearing an elaborate Ming Dynasty golden phoenix crown with hanging pearl tassels, and a richly embroidered red and blue robe with an intricate cloud shoulder (yunjian) design. She holds a traditional circular silk fan. Snowflakes are falling gently. The lighting is soft, diffused winter daylight, cinematic and luxurious. Beige text "VOGUE" is at the very top, and smaller text "MING DYNASTY INSPIRED" is on the left side. Symmetrical composition, 4k resolution, ultra-realistic.
提示词2：完整

生成一张 9:16 竖版「高端时尚杂志封面级」写实照片：以我上传的 FACE_REF 为人物身份参考，100%还原五官与骨相；人物身穿“明制华丽礼服方向”的重工汉服（多层叠穿、手工刺绣/织金锦、贵重金饰头面），在故宫红墙长廊雪景中拍摄。画面具备《Vogue》《Harper’s Bazaar》《ELLE》《Cosmopolitan》《Marie Claire》《i-D》《Allure》《FLAUNT》级别的摄影、造型与封面设计，以上杂志随机任选一作为杂志的封面设计，并保持选择杂志的一贯设计风格（中英文设计）
【INPUTS | 输入】
FACE_REF：我上传的人物五官参考图（身份锁定）
【ABSOLUTE PRIORITY | 身份锁定（最高优先级）】
100%还原 FACE_REF 的五官与骨相：眼距、鼻梁鼻翼、唇形、下颌线、颧骨结构完全一致，不得漂移。
真实皮肤质感：可见细微纹理与毛孔，不要过度磨皮与网红化。成年女性形象（adult）。
【SHOT TYPE | 景别二选一（由模型随机选其一，且必须真实统一）】
A) 半身封面：胸口到腰上方，头面与上身刺绣最清晰，眼睛对焦最锐利（主推）
B) 全身封面：从头到脚完整呈现层叠礼服与裙摆纹样，长廊纵深与红墙透视更强（备选）
（无论A/B：都必须保持“封面构图”，有留白空间给排版，但不要撕纸/手绘效果。）
【LOCATION | 场景（故宫/紫禁城）】
北京故宫红墙长廊：朱红墙、红柱、雕花窗棂、彩绘梁坊细节与强调透视纵深。
天气二选一（随机）：1) 细雪飘落 2) 雪后晴朗（檐下/台阶残雪、空气通透）
背景干净：无游客、无现代标识、无手机状态栏UI、无水印字幕。
【LIGHTING & CAMERA | 摄影质感（杂志级）】
镜头感：85mm人像质感（半身）或 50mm/70mm（全身），浅景深，眼睛最清晰。
光线：冬日自然光 + 柔和补光；金饰/珠翠有真实高光但不爆；刺绣纹理清晰可辨。
色彩：高级电影感，红墙与服装主色不互相脏染；整体干净、通透、质感厚。
【WARDROBE | 明制华丽礼服（重工、多层叠、可读的硬锚点）】
目标审美：“金饰为主、流苏密集、凤冠、衣服大面积织金刺绣、层叠繁复但高级不俗艳”。
轮廓与层次（必须多层叠穿）
内层：白色里衣立领/里领清晰可见（干净、挺括，做出层次边界）
中层：对襟袄/衫（或方领/立领结构感），袖口宽大、滚边精细
外层：披帛/霞帔式的礼服结构（有明显“压襟/佩饰”承托），整体层次厚重
下装：长裙/马面裙方向，裙摆纹样连续，底边有织金边或刺绣边（全身版本必须明显）
面料与工艺（重手艺必须“看得见”）
主面料：织金锦/提花锦（真实纤维感，暗纹浮起）
主要工艺：盘金绣、金线绣、立体刺绣、贴布绣（让花纹有“微微起伏”的厚度）
纹样主题：牡丹/团花/祥云/瑞兽（精致、密度高、但图案边缘清晰，瑞兽不能是龙）
细节：滚边、暗扣、系带、护领、胸前“压襟/璎珞感”层叠装饰（但不杂乱）
头面（黄金为主的重工头饰，必须华丽）
金色为主的方向：金丝累珠、点翠/珠翠、密集簪钗、左右对称的长流苏坠饰，凤冠
流苏长度与密度要“明显”：走动或微风时有轻微摆动
耳饰/颈饰：金+珍珠+玉（贵重但不廉价闪）
【COLOR MATRIX | 颜色矩阵搭配（必须执行，且必须“多彩刺绣”）】
从以下三套“主色方案”中随机选 1 套作为【底色/大面积主面料色】。
注意：主色只决定“底色”，刺绣必须是【宫廷织锦式多色刺绣】（不允许只有金色刺绣）。
Scheme G（翡翠绿底）：
底色：翡翠绿/孔雀绿（大面积主面料）
刺绣：多色绣线 + 盘金绣混用（至少包含：金色、朱红/胭脂红、宝蓝/靛蓝、米白、淡紫或藕粉）
层次点亮：米白里领/内衬边 + 少量朱红与宝蓝作为“宫廷撞色”点缀
Scheme A（杏底）：
底色：暖杏/米杏（大面积主面料）
刺绣：多色绣线 + 盘金绣混用（至少包含：金色、翡翠绿/松石绿、朱红/珊瑚红、孔雀蓝/靛蓝、米白）
层次点亮：用翡翠绿与朱红做小面积宫廷撞色，保持“雅而不素、贵而不艳”
Scheme R（红底）：
底色：深朱红/绛红（大面积主面料）
刺绣：多色绣线 + 盘金绣混用（至少包含：金色、孔雀蓝/靛蓝、松石绿、米白、胭脂粉或珊瑚红）
层次点亮：米白里领/内衬边 + 少量翡翠绿或孔雀蓝作冷暖对比
【颜色执行规则】
“多彩刺绣”必须看得见：至少 4 种以上彩色绣线清晰可辨，且与金线叠加，形成丰富层次。
纹样边缘要清晰，不糊成一片；红墙背景下服装与背景必须分离，层次清楚、低脏度、厚而不闷。
禁止出现“单一金色刺绣覆盖全身”的单调效果。
【POSE | 封面姿态（端庄、贵气、非摆拍俗气）】
半身：双手在身前轻持团扇/宫扇（扇面刺绣清晰），或一手轻拢袖口一手自然垂落
全身：站姿端正、重心稳定，裙摆自然垂坠；袖摆形成优雅弧线
表情：沉静、克制、自信；不要夸张大笑，不要做短视频“眨眼比心”。
【OUTPUT | 输出】
1 张 9:16 竖版写实杂志封面级照片
随机：半身 or 全身（A/B二选一）
随机：雪中 or 雪后晴朗（天气二选一）
随机：翡翠绿 / 杏/红 /（颜色矩阵三选一）
造型：明制华丽礼服方向 + 金色重工凤冠头面 + 多层叠穿 + 大面积织金刺绣
description_en: 上传一张人物参考照片，建议上传正脸，光线不要太暗，暗光和暗色背景会影响最终效果。

name: LOMO Aerial: Lady Above the Billboards
chinese: 基于【参考照片人物】。这是一张LOMO Ic-a风格的高清摄影作品。采用高角度俯拍视角（High angle shot），镜头聚焦于一位绝美的电影女演员。 她身穿黑色长风衣， 面容与气质与【参考照片人物】完全一致。 她正站在铺满地面的无数黑白网格艺术人像海报之上。 由于视角的缘故，可以清晰看到地面上所有海报的内容， 全都是她本人演绎的不同风格的高端商业模特摄影大片， 仿佛她站在自己无数个不同造型的分身之上。
description_en: 上传一张人物参考照片
description_zh: 上传一张人物参考照片

name: Micro World on Product
english: Create an ultra-detailed, miniature, surreal world built entirely around the product shown in the attached image. Design tiny, lifelike figures that interact naturally and logically with the product as if it is their complete environment. Every element of architecture, terrain, tools, textures, and lighting must adapt organically to the product’s real physical form, materials, and surface characteristics. Avoid any preconceived interpretations; instead, let the product's geometry dictate the world’s design. Ensure the figures’ interactions subtly highlight the product’s features without feeling like an advertisement. Render with photorealistic depth, cinematic macro photography, shallow depth of field, micro-details, soft volumetric lighting, and seamless integration between characters and the product. The final composition should feel like a believable, tiny ecosystem existing on and around the product itself. 16:9 aspect ratio.
description_en: Upload a photo of a product.
description_zh: Upload a photo of a product.

name: Brand Miniatures in Acrylic Box
name_zh: 亚克力盒中品牌微缩模型
chinese: 一个透明亚克力展示盒内的微缩场景,呈现[品牌名称]精品店面。店面采用[品牌主色调]外立面[节日装饰],顶部有"[品牌LOGO]"的大型标识,[编号]金色数字装饰。
店内温暖金色照明,玻璃橱窗和玻璃门,橱窗内展示微缩[品牌核心产品1、产品2、产品3][节日特别版产品]。
店门前[随机位置:站立/坐在长椅上/蹲着/靠墙倚着]一个可爱的Q版卡通人物,大头身比例,闪亮的kawaii动漫大眼睛,[随机动作][节日特定动作]。
人物穿着[随机服饰组合][节日装扮元素],搭配[随机下装],戴着[随机配饰0-2个][节日配饰]。手持[随机道具1-2个][节日道具]。
[随机宠物0-1个][节日宠物装扮]。角色具有kawaii动漫美学风格,[随机表情]的表情,[随机发型][节日发饰],体现[品牌调性]。
场景置于[随机木材]质底座上,配有刻有"No.[编号] [品牌名]"的黄铜铭牌。[随机装饰元素2-4个][节日装饰元素2-4个]。柔和环境光营造温暖反射效果,飘浮着[随机氛围元素][节日氛围元素]。
3D渲染风格,高度精细的微缩场景,产品摄影级光效,浅景深,暖色调主导,所有元素配色和谐统一(以[品牌主色调]为基础,融合[节日配色方案]),[品牌氛围][节日氛围]。
{以 Apple 为例}
description_en: 功能：直接展示品牌的宣传和海报。
description_zh: 功能：直接展示品牌的宣传和海报。

name: Hidden Face in Objects
english: Create an image that looks like a tabletop still-life of many small objects buttons, screws, coins, leaves, matchsticks scattered naturally, yet from a top-down view they form a clear human face portrait through careful arrangement and shading. Use neutral tones, soft overhead light, and gentle vignette. The face should emerge at mid-distance viewing: close up it’s “just objects,” zoomed out it’s unmistakably a portrait. Add realistic cast shadows under each object to enhance depth. Background: worn wooden table with scratches. Keep the arrangement organic, not too symmetrical. No text, no obvious outlines, no artificial glow.

name: 3D City Island Letters Poster
english: Create an ultra-HD, hyper-realistic 1:1 poster of a “CITY” in miniature island with “CITY”, featuring iconic landmarks.
The 3D letters “CITY” should blend naturally with the terrain—carved into cliffs or shaped by the coastline.
The scene is a bright, sunny day with vivid colors, cinematic lighting, and photorealistic details (sun rays, lush greenery, deep blue water).
Add artistic touches like seagulls, boats, or aerial perspective for scale and grandeur. Ultra-quality, 8K+ resolution. Square dimension 1080x1080.

name: Symmetrical Spectrum Illusion
english: [SUBJECT] illustrated as a Symmetrical Spectrum Illusion, with balanced geometric shapes creating a captivating optical effect. Highlight the symmetry with a color palette of [COLOR1] and [COLOR2]. --ar 3:2
description_en: Example 1: [SUBJECT] Owl, [COLOR] lavender and charcoal.  Example 2: [SUBJECT] Cathedral, [COLOR] emerald green and crimson.  Example 3: [SUBJECT] A human face, [COLOR] rose and charcoal.  Example 4: [SUBJECT] Butterfly, [COLOR] turquoise and gold.
description_zh: Example 1: [SUBJECT] Owl, [COLOR] lavender and charcoal.  Example 2: [SUBJECT] Cathedral, [COLOR] emerald green and crimson.  Example 3: [SUBJECT] A human face, [COLOR] rose and charcoal.  Example 4: [SUBJECT] Butterfly, [COLOR] turquoise and gold.

name: Product with Powder Burst
english: [PRODUCT] at center of [colored powder, flour, cocoa, pigment] explosion, particles radiating outward, frozen chaos, high-speed flash photography, dynamic energy, against black background, festival of color, impactful advertising.
description_en: Example 1 (Fig. 1): [PRODUCT] - A vintage film camera, [Powder] deep indigo pigment; Example 2 (Fig. 2): [PRODUCT] - A modern sneaker mid-stride, [Powder] neon coral pigment; Example 3 (Fig. 3): [PRODUCT] - An open umbrella, [Powder] colorful pigment; Example 4 (Fig. 4): [PRODUCT] - A classic glass lightbulb (unlit), [Powder] soft pearl-white powder.
description_zh: Example 1 (Fig. 1): [PRODUCT] - A vintage film camera, [Powder] deep indigo pigment; Example 2 (Fig. 2): [PRODUCT] - A modern sneaker mid-stride, [Powder] neon coral pigment; Example 3 (Fig. 3): [PRODUCT] - An open umbrella, [Powder] colorful pigment; Example 4 (Fig. 4): [PRODUCT] - A classic glass lightbulb (unlit), [Powder] soft pearl-white powder.

name: Moody Cinematic Portrait
english: Generate a moody cinematic portrait of a young male model with light skin, soft textured wavy hair, dressed in a fitted black suit with dark shirt, standing against a black background, harsh directional lighting from the left casting deep shadows, model looking forward with piercing eyes and a tense jawline, one hand clutching his collar near the neck, motion blur effect slicing across the face horizontally from left to right, blending light streaks in muted amber and beige tones, sharp contrast between still and blurred zones, stylized editorial tone with subtle film grain and soft falloff, no digital smoothness or plasticity, skin texture and shadows intact, emotionally charged expression, light halo around hair, minimal background details.

name: Emotional Drip Cascade
english: [SUBJECT] conveyed through an Emotional Drip Cascade, where drips of paint flow down the canvas, creating a visual representation of emotional release. Use [COLOR1] and [COLOR2] in a controlled drip technique, allowing the colors to flow and interact, expressing emotion through their movement and blending. --ar 3:2.
description_en: [SUBJECT]: A solitary violinist; [COLOR1]: crimson; [COLOR2]: indigo.    [SUBJECT]: A blooming lotus; [COLOR1]: teal; [COLOR2]: gold.    [SUBJECT]: A dancer in motion; [COLOR1]: sapphire blue; [COLOR2]: copper.    [SUBJECT]: A winter fox in snowfall; [COLOR1]: pearl white; [COLOR2]: crimson lake.
description_zh: [SUBJECT]: A solitary violinist; [COLOR1]: crimson; [COLOR2]: indigo.    [SUBJECT]: A blooming lotus; [COLOR1]: teal; [COLOR2]: gold. name: Characters in the Historical Scroll
english: Hyper-realistic 3D masterpiece, set against a magnificent, endless traditional ink-wash historical scroll painting unfurling across the background.The scene visualizes the cultural soul and intangible heritage of [在此处填入地点或主题], featuring [在此处填入具体形象，如：a Flying Apsara playing the Pipa / a Peking Opera warrior] leaping vividly from the scroll.• Composition: The character breaks the fourth wall, transitioning from the flat paper into the 3D space. Dynamic pose capturing a moment of peak action.• Visual Effect: 2D black ink brushstrokes on the paper surface morph seamlessly into high-fidelity 3D realistic skin, flowing silk fabrics, and exquisite embroidery.• Details: Faded ancient parchment texture, floating historical calligraphy characters, red seal stamps, [可选细节：falling flower petals / glowing musical notes / swirling smoke].• Lighting: Dramatic stage lighting or ethereal divine glow illuminating the character, contrasting with the monochrome ink background. Subsurface scattering on skin.• Specs: 8K resolution, high detail, Unreal Engine 5 render, cinematic composition.--ar 16:9 --stylize 350 --no buildings, rigid structures, modern clothing, cartoons, low resolution.
变脸艺术：
[具体形象] ：a Sichuan Opera performer changing masks, breathing fire
[细节] ：sparks and flames blending with ink splashes
description_en: 三个场景：敦煌飞天舞，四川民间变脸艺术，少林功夫。
description_zh: 三个场景：敦煌飞天舞，四川民间变脸艺术，少林功夫。

name: 3D Pop-out Grid Collage (w/ Title)
chinese: 一个由粗白线构成的超现实3x3网格拼贴。背景展示了8种不同可爱行为和角度的[动物]（打哈欠、睡觉、玩耍、歪头、吃东西、微笑、爪子特写）。中心单元格被隐藏。叠加了一个巨大的超写实全身3D剪影的[动物]，它正从网格中俏皮地跳出来。所有元素都清晰锐利，深度场f/16，没有浅景虚化，明亮柔光箱照明以突出毛皮纹理，触感蓬松的细节，强烈的3D弹出效果。
整个拼贴下方标注3d英文[动物]标题，在风格上与整体设计统一，融合[动物]特征，标题位于最下排，对最下排网格贴有所遮挡。8k分辨率，C4D渲染风格 --ar 5:8 --v 6.1
description_en: 为 3D 立体网格拼贴画添加动物风格的 [标题]
description_zh: 为 3D 立体网格拼贴画添加动物风格的 [标题]

name: 3D Pop-out Grid Collage
english: Surreal 3x3 grid collage with THICK WHITE LINES. Background shows [detailed description of animals/characters] in 8 different cute behaviors and angles (yawning, sleeping, playing, tilting head, close-up of paws). CENTER CELL HIDDEN. OVERLAID by a massive hyper-realistic full-body 3D cut-out of the SAME [detailed description of animals/characters] jumping forward out of the grid playfully. ALL elements sharp, deep depth of field f/16, no bokeh, bright softbox lighting to highlight fur texture, tactile fluffy details, strong 3D pop-out effect, 8k resolution, C4D render style --ar 2:3 --v 6.1

name: Edit by Annotation
chinese: 请识别图片中所有人工添加的标记和手写文字指令，执行以下步骤：
1、理解标记的意图，对标记所至的区域和对象进行编辑修改
2、确保编辑后内容与原图一致，包括光影、透视效果、质感
3、修改后的图片，移除画面上所有的辅助标记和文字，确保画面无残留。
description_en: 功能：通过在图片上添加文字/箭头/标注等批注来指导编辑或生成新图片。
三步改图：
第一步：在Gemini上传要修改的照片，选择【生成图片】模式。
第二步：点击图片进入图片编辑模式，直接在画面上用文字、箭头、圈画等方式，标注清楚修改内容。
第三步：输入上述提示词，提交生成。注意：生成速度会比普通出图稍慢，耐心等下就能看到成果。

name: The Man Drinking Coffee in Shop
name_zh: 咖啡厅里喝咖啡的男人
english: A scene capturing a candid, natural moment from daily life in a cozy, bustling coffee shop. The lighting is soft, diffused daylight coming from a large window, mixing with the warm tungsten of the interior. The prompt MUST emulate natural realism and look like an un-staged snapshot. Shot with a 50mm lens at eye level. The male subject, whose face is "Upload face as reference", is laughing mid-conversation, holding a ceramic mug of latte with foam art. He wears a casual denim jacket over a white t-shirt. The steam rising from the coffee and the casual disarray of the table look 200% Real. The mood is happy, spontaneous, and authentically human.
description_en: Upload your image
description_zh: Upload your image

name: Christmas Event Invitation Card
chinese: 设计欢乐圣诞活动邀请卡，卡通风格，彩色气球和礼物图案，顶部大字"圣诞狂欢party"，中文"时间: 12月25日晚7点"、"地点: 上海皇家酒店"，可爱圣诞老人招手，活泼有趣风格，宽高比：9:16。

name: Watercolor Christmas Card
english: Watercolor, cute and adorable christmas postcard design with scandinavian houses, a rocking horse, and a christmas tree toy on the background of the city in red, green, and yellow colors. the text “merry christmas” is written at the center bottom. the background is white paper, with candles and a warm, soft pastel color palette, creating a cozy christmas vibe.

name: Christmas Card Based on References
name_zh: 基于参考图片的圣诞贺卡
english: Prompt example 1: (Fig. 1~2)

A faithfully illustrated Christmas card design featuring the couple in Christmas hats, and the text "Happy Christmas 2025", it is friendly and traditional, with a classical design, in a winter wonderland.
Prompt example 2: (Fig. 3~4)

A photorealistic wide shot of [upload reference images of family members] standing together in a snowy European Christmas market at night. They are wearing matching red and white Nordic wool sweaters. In the foreground, written clearly in the snow in elegant cursive handwriting, is the text: 'Happy Holidays from The Smiths'. Soft bokeh lights in the background, cinematic lighting, 8k resolution.

description_zh: Upload reference images of people

name: Ink Fluid Illustration
english: The [subject] is formed from liquid plumes swirling in milky water. Soft diffusion, abstract forms, rich ink blacks, and cloudy whites blending naturally, giving a dreamy, poetic impression.

description_zh: Examples: [subject] can be `a violinist in motion`, `a fallen knight`, `a meditating monk`, `a ballerina`

name: Creamy Christmas Photoshoot
chinese: 参考我上传的人物照片，生成一张高分辨率彩色、真实摄影质感的竖构图时尚人像（3:4）；精准保持人物样貌一致性（脸型与五官比例不变）。景别为三分之二身，机位接近眼平略低；人物偏画面右侧构图，背景大面积为覆霜/雪粉质感的圣诞树；浅景深突出人物面部与肩颈线条，树上暖黄灯串与金色挂饰形成柔和散景光斑。
主体：年轻优雅女性，黑色微卷长发，留一缕发丝拂过面颊；肤色自然通透但保留毛孔与真实纹理；妆容清透高级，唇色自然豆沙/玫瑰；穿象牙白抹胸无袖纱质礼服，胸口与腰部有细碎珠饰与亮片点缀，裙摆多层硬纱与软纱叠层，体积感与线条柔和；佩戴细项链与精致手链，轻奢克制。
动作：人物侧坐在地面/浅色地毯前，身体朝左侧微侧转，头部回转直视镜头；嘴唇微启，表情温柔克制带节日微醺感；左手抬起放在后颈/颈侧像整理头发，右手在胸前轻拢抹胸上缘，动作自然不夸张，肩颈线条舒展。
环境：温暖木质墙面+复古黑色壁灯/吊灯，整体木屋感与节庆氛围；画面干净无杂物。
光线：正前方略偏左柔光主光照面部与上半身，阴影过渡顺滑无硬阴影；圣诞树灯串与壁灯作为暖色环境光与点光源形成金色散景；整体色调为暖奶油金与冷霜绿对比，肤色不过曝、亮部柔和。
镜头质感：全画幅+85mm风格，f/1.8–f/2.2浅景深，对焦眼睛与面部，背景明显虚化但仍可辨识树与灯结构；无HDR感。
细节：保留真实皮肤纹理与自然高光，避免塑料皮；珠饰微闪不过曝；纱裙层叠纹理清晰、边缘有空气感与轻微透光；树枝雪粉颗粒感可见；加入中低强度胶片颗粒+极轻暗角。
description_en: 上传一张高清半身照
description_zh: 上传一张高清半身照

name: Tiny Room in ESC: Escape the Crowd
english: A beautifully detailed miniature diorama built inside a giant computer keycap shaped like the 'ESC' key. Soft warm lighting fills the tiny room. Inside, a girl sits peacefully by a small window, reading a book, bathed in gentle lamplight. Tiny wooden furniture, a bookshelf, a rug, and a window frame enhance the cozy atmosphere. Hyper-realistic textures, handcrafted miniature aesthetic, shallow depth of field, cinematic macro photography, whimsical and calming mood.

name: Chibi Exclusive Crystal Ball Memories
english: If a reference image is provided, strictly adhere to the character's appearance in the uploaded image; if no reference image is provided, ignore this instruction.
High-quality 3D render, Pixar animation style, Cute Chibi collectible snow globe, Miniature photography feel, Tilt-shift lens, shallow depth of field.

Inside the globe, a cute Chibi [AUTO_CHARACTER] wearing [AUTO_OUTFIT] with [AUTO_DETAIL_1] and [AUTO_DETAIL_2], [AUTO_EQUIPMENT_1], and [AUTO_EQUIPMENT_2] is in a dynamic [AUTO_ACTION], [AUTO_EXPRESSION]. [AUTO_COMPANION] [AUTO_COMPANION_ACTION].
The "ground" beneath them is [AUTO_GROUND]. Suspended elements: [AUTO_PARTICLE_1], [AUTO_PARTICLE_2], and [AUTO_PARTICLE_3].

Crystal clear glass, slight caustics, volumetric lighting inside mimicking [AUTO_LIGHTING]. Heavy [AUTO_BASE] base with [AUTO_BASE_DETAIL]. Luxurious [AUTO_PLAQUE] plaque engraved "[SPORT_NAME]" with handwritten signature "[RanRan]" in flowing calligraphy.
Placed on [AUTO_PEDESTAL] with [AUTO_LIGHT_SETUP]. Background is beautifully blurred bokeh of [AUTO_ENVIRONMENT]. [AUTO_ATMOSPHERE], creating [AUTO_LIGHT_EFFECT]. [AUTO_MOOD] atmosphere.
Configuration example:
| `[AUTO_CHARACTER]` | 小女孩（**若上传了参考图，请严格依据图中小女孩的面部特征、发型、肤色等还原；若无参考图，则使用以下默认设定**）|
| `[AUTO_OUTFIT]` | 粉色连帽卫衣和牛仔背带裤 |

name: Layered Paper Cut-out - Dunhuang Flying Apsara
name_zh: 立体分层剪纸 - 敦煌飞仙
english: A vibrant, modern 3D layered paper cut-out diorama based on the Dunhuang flying apsara motif from the image uploaded. Distinct physical layers of brightly colored, saturated matte art papers are stacked to create a vivid, fresh scene without any aged effects. Each element (figure, ribbons, clouds, flowers) is a clean die-cut layer. Deep drop shadows enhance the tunnel-book depth. The color palette is a rich spectrum of pure, brilliant blues, reds, golds, greens, and whites. Modern studio lighting highlights the textures and shadows. 8k resolution, Octane render.
chinese: 基于上传图片中的敦煌飞天主题，创作一个充满活力且现代的3D分层剪纸透视场景。使用色彩鲜艳、高饱和度的哑光艺术纸层层堆叠，形成分明的物理层次，营造出一个生动、清新的画面，没有任何陈旧或做旧的效果。每一个元素（人物、飘带、云朵、花卉）都是边缘干净利落的模切层。深邃的投射阴影增强了“隧道书”般的纵深感。配色方案采用纯净、明亮的蓝色、红色、金色、绿色和白色的丰富光谱。现代摄影棚布光突显了纸张的纹理与阴影。8k分辨率，Octane渲染。
description_en: Upload a photo of Dunhuang Flying Apsara.
description_zh: 上传一张敦煌飞天壁画照片。

name: Chibi 3D Paper-cut Characters
chinese: Q版【角色名】角色，中国神话风格，采用3D渲染的剪纸艺术风格，角色居中呈现，展现该角色的标志性特征、服饰、武器和神态表情。角色站立或腾空于祥云之上，姿态充满动感和个性，身后飘扬的披风或飘带营造出律动感。
背景采用极其重要的多层次同心圆剪纸隧道构图，由外向内呈现红色到米白色的渐变层次。最外层是鲜艳的珊瑚红色剪纸云朵和火焰图案，火焰分为橙红色和蓝色两种色调，象征冷暖对比。中间层次有白色祥云剪纸元素点缀，增添神话氛围。整体采用显著的分层纸雕效果，每层之间有明显的阴影和景深，营造立体浮雕质感。
色彩调色板以中国红(#E63946)、金黄色(#F4A261)、米白色(#F1FAEE)、深棕色为主，搭配蓝色火焰点缀，形成冷暖对比。光照采用柔和的漫射光，突出纸质材料的细腻质感和层次阴影。纹理表现为哑光纸质表面，边缘有精细的剪纸切割线条。
整体风格融合中国传统剪纸工艺与现代3D建模技术，呈现出童趣可爱又不失神话史诗感的视觉效果，类似皮克斯或梦工厂的中国风动画角色设计风格。
description_en: 将【角色名】替换为任意西游记角色即可，例如：孙悟空、猪八戒、沙和尚、唐僧、白龙马、观音菩萨、如来佛祖等。

Museum-level artifact photography, surrealistic realism, awe-inspiring craftsmanship, no modern symbols, no people, masterpieces.

She rests her face gently on her hand, gazing thoughtfully toward the poster, creating a visual dialogue between realism and illustration. Warm ambient indoor lighting, soft shadows, shallow depth of field, cinematic color grading with beige and warm brown tones. Ultra-realistic photography blended with clean graphic illustration, editorial magazine style, high resolution, modern cinematic aesthetic.

Filmic color grading with warm highlights, soft contrast, and subtle motion blur for realism.
Shot on a 35mm lens, high detail, ultra-realistic, timeless cinematic photography.

The background is an abstract composition of red, yellow, and blue blocks within a stylized ornate gold frame. The entire image uses flat, bold primary colors, dramatic shadows, and visible Ben-Day dots for a retro, graphic effect.

A woman with curly dark hair, wearing a long black dress and ankle boots, stands thoughtfully between two large portrait artworks. On the left, a hyper-realistic photographic portrait with deep burgundy background, soft studio lighting, sharp facial detail, and elegant color grading. On the right, an expressive oil painting of the same woman, created with bold brush strokes, vibrant reds, blues, and oranges, emphasizing emotion and texture. Google Gemini Minimalist gallery walls with worn plaster textures, polished concrete floor, museum-style composition, shallow depth of field, cinematic framing, high realism, artistic contrast between realism and abstraction, gallery exhibition atmosphere, 8K detail, professional fine-art photography style.

The folds capture the character’s iconic features, outfit, and silhouette in a simplified geometric form. Placed on a clean studio surface with soft shadows. english: Transform this movie poster into an origami version, as if the entire artwork is folded from high-quality paper. Preserve the key elements of the poster so it remains instantly recognizable, but simplify shapes into crisp folds, geometric paper edges, and realistic paper.

name: Visual Recipes
english: Create step-by-step recipe infographic for creamy garlic mushroom pasta, top-down view, minimal style on white background, ingredient photos labeled: "200g spaghetti", "150g mushrooms", "3 garlic cloves", "200ml cream", "1 tbsp olive oil", "parmesan", "parsley", dotted lines showing process steps with icons (boiling pot, sauté pan, mixing), final plated pasta shot at the bottom.

name: Visual Recursion: Matryoshka Dolls of Picture Frames
english: A man with wide, horrified eyes holds a large, ornate picture frame. Inside the frame is a perfect photograph of him holding the same frame with the same horrified expression. Inside that frame is a smaller version, spiraling inward. He is falling forward into the picture, tumbling endlessly into smaller and smaller iterations of his own trapped moment, shrinking into infinity with no bottom to hit.

The Trap: He is caught in Visual Recursion. He has become a "strange loop" where he is simultaneously the container and the content, doomed to repeat the same moment at exponentially diminishing scales.

name: Floating Emotional Bubbles
english: A [SUBJECT] sits alone in a minimalistic room filled with floating, semi-transparent thought bubbles. Each bubble contains a fragment of their face from different emotional states — smiling, crying, screaming — forming a psychological self-portrait suspended in mid-air.

name: Crumpled Pieces of Paper
english: A photorealistic image of the word '[NAME]' spelled out using torn, highly crumpled pieces of white paper. Each letter is painted in bold [COLOR] on individual scraps, arranged loosely and unevenly, as if placed casually by hand, on a wooden table. The composition should convey a natural, handmade aesthetic with visible creases, shadows, and wood grain detail.

name: Deep Sea Storage
english: A [SUBJECT] is crouching on the beach, lifting a wave like a carpet to reveal a [OBJECT] lying underneath deep inside. The ocean is calm with a clear blue sky in the background. The scene creates a clever illusion, in a surreal manner, with the wave being lifted as if it is a tangible object

name: Tilt-shift Photography
english: A highly detailed tilt-shift photography of [LOCATION] captured from a high vantage point at [TIME OF DAY, e.g., golden hour sunset], transforming the iconic structure and surrounding landscape into a whimsical miniature toy model scene, with pinpoint sharp focus on the central elements like buildings, pathways, and key landmarks, gradually blurring into soft bokeh towards the edges and foreground/background for an exaggerated shallow depth of field effect; vibrant color palette featuring [COLOR SCHEME, e.g., warm oranges and deep blues], intricate textures on surfaces such as stone, foliage, or water reflections, subtle atmospheric haze or mist adding depth and realism, photorealistic rendering with high dynamic range lighting casting long dramatic shadows, ultra-high resolution 8K, cinematic composition emphasizing symmetry and leading lines, in the style of professional architectural miniature photography.

name: Vintage Found-footage Photographs that Never Existed
name_zh: 从未存在过的复古伪纪录片照片
english: A photographic image in the style of 1870, [SCENE DESCRIPTION], with [CHARACTERS described in period-accurate clothing], [Describe the interaction].
The photo has an aged and worn appearance, as it was taken in 1870. It features prominent time-induced chemical stains, heavy grain, sepia toning, and deep scratches.
Significantly reduce the sharpness so that the details of the [SUBJECT] are not crisp, making the [SUBJECT] blurry and low-fidelity.

Greatly increase the wear of the photo, including small tears, missing corners, water damage, and small wormholes caused by insect damage. Add a prominent, jagged diagonal cut across the photo, mended clumsily with old, discolored tape.

name: Surreal Travel Themed Digital Artwork
name_zh: 超现实旅行主题数字艺术作品
english: A surreal travel-themed digital artwork depicting a hand holding a sleek, frameless smartphone or tablet tilted at a 45-degree angle.

The device displays a high-resolution image of the EIFFEL tower, seamlessly blending into the realistic landscape behind it. the EIFFEL tower extends out of the screen and rises into the sky, creating a hyper-realistic 3D illusion.

Hot air balloons float around the tower, and white doves fly across a soft golden sunset sky. the bold text "paris" appears in the clouds behind the tower in a double-exposure style, using a clean, modern sans-serif font.
The overall style is dreamy, photorealistic, and vibrant - perfect for a luxury travel campaign or social media advertisement.

name: Mountains Rising from Parchment Map
english: "prompt": "A hyper-realistic 3D isometric masterpiece of an enchanted map unfurled on a polished dark wooden table. The map is on an ancient, weathered parchment scroll, but the landscape rises from the paper in a pop-up diorama style. Towering rocky mountains with snow-capped peaks pierce through wisps of white clouds, a winding turquoise river flows through the center, and dense lush green pine forests cover the foothills. The parchment features jagged edges, intricate vintage calligraphy script on the left, and compass rose illustrations in the corners. Warm cinematic lighting, sharp focus, highly detailed textures, 8k resolution, fantasy adventure theme."
"negative_prompt": "flat, 2d, simple drawing, blurry, low quality, distorted, watermark, bad anatomy, text overlay, grainy"
"parameters": { "aspect_ratio": "2:3", "style": "Cinematic 3D Render", "view": "Isometric" }

name: Village Drawn with Letters
english: A beautiful coastal village formed entirely from layered letters and words, the typography shaping hills, paths, and shadows. In the distance, a single tree grows from stacked sentences, its branches made of punctuation. Rendered in conceptual typographic art style with restrained colors and a thoughtful, imaginative atmosphere.

name: Commercials: Sensory Dynamic Macro
name_zh: 商业广告：动态感官特写
chinese: 一张极具感官诱惑力的 8k 商业微距摄影，聚焦于 [在此处填入你的主题，如：一块刚刚炸好的脆皮炸鸡 / 一杯加满冰块的苏打水 / 一抹涂抹开的丝绒口红]的高光时刻。
动态与构图：
画面捕捉了物体**[选择一种动态：发生碰撞 / 汁水飞溅 / 缓慢流淌 / 刚刚被切开]**的瞬间。这不是静止的摆拍，而是充满了爆发力的动态定格。构图极度聚焦，主体几乎填满画面，带来强烈的视觉压迫感和满足感。
极致的感官细节：
重点刻画材质的物理诱惑力。
(如果是食物)：强调表面的焦化色泽、正在滴落的晶莹油脂/水珠、升腾的丝丝热气，以及撒落的调味碎屑，隔着屏幕都能感受到酥脆或多汁的口感。
(如果是产品)：强调表面的颗粒度、液体的流动张力或完美的倒角光泽。
光影氛围：
采用高对比度的商业布光（Rembrandt Lighting 或硬光直射），光源色彩温暖而饱满。背景是[描述背景，如：深色的虚化背景 / 与主体互补的高饱和纯色]，以最大程度衬托主体的鲜活色彩。画面锐度极高，每一滴飞溅的微粒都清晰可辨。

name: 3D Ultra Realistic Product Shot
english: Create an ultra-realistic 3D commercial-style product shot of a [premium cherry juice bottle], suspended mid-air with intricate condensation droplets on its surface. The bottle should appear fresh and vibrant, with each condensation bead reflecting ambient light to enhance photorealism. Surround the product with dynamic elements like [splashing droplets of cherry juice, whole cherries, and ice cubes], frozen in high-speed motion, each element sharply defined with vibrant clarity. [Floating cherry stems and leaves] should also be included to enhance the sense of freshness and energy.

Set the background against a rich, deep [red and burgundy gradient], which complements the rich color of the [cherry juice] and evokes a sense of indulgence and premium quality. The product should be centrally placed, slightly tilted to convey a sense of movement and sophistication.

Use cinematic, studio-style lighting with bright highlights reflecting off the bottle, crisp shadows, and high contrast to create a luxurious, polished look. Ensure the bottle’s label is clearly visible, with subtle reflections beneath it, adding depth and realism to the scene.

The overall aesthetic must evoke indulgence, freshness, and premium quality, with all elements contributing to a high-end, visually striking image. The scene should feel rich, fresh, and full of vitality, with a focus on the vibrant color and fresh nature of the cherry juice.
Technical Specifications:
Aspect Ratio: 4:5
Resolution: Ultra-HD quality
Lighting: Studio-style, cinematic with bright highlights, subtle reflections, and high contrast
Detailing: Extreme attention to condensation, droplets, and high-speed motion of elements

name: Chrono-Spatial Architect: Deconstructing the Evolution of Civilization
name_zh: 时空建筑师：解构文明演进
english: # Role Definition

You are a Chrono-Spatial Architect (时空建筑师). Your goal is to create a hyper-dense, vertically stacked isometric visualization of a **specific region's historical evolution**. You must remove all artificial borders. The landscape represents a timeline: the bottom is the region's ancient past, rising vertically through history to a modern or futuristic peak.
# Core Competency
**CRITICAL VISUAL STRATEGY (Frameless Time-Lapse):**
1. Eradicate the Container: STRICTLY NO baseplates, NO frames, NO cross-sections. The bottom edge is the ancient terrain extending infinitely.
2. The Vertical Timeline: The "Zig-Zag Ascent" is a journey through Time.
* Bottom (Foreground): Ancient/Original State (The Roots).
* Middle (Ascending): Industrialization/Urbanization (The Growth).
* Top (Background):* Modern Skyline/Futuristic Vision (The Peak).
3. Integrated 3D Title: The **[Location Name]** must be rendered as massive, cinematic 3D Typography standing on the ancient ground in the foreground.
# Work Process (Internal "Chain of Thought")
When provided with **[Location Name]**:
1. Retrieve Historical Data: Identify 5-7 distinct architectural eras or key landmarks associated with this specific location.
2. Layout the Zig-Zag Timeline:
* Base: Primitive landscape + Oldest landmark.
* Ascent: Gradual introduction of density, height, and technology.
* Peak: The most iconic modern skyscrapers or future concept.
3. Evolution Details: Visualize the **change in transportation and clothing** at each level.
# Output Format (The Final Prompt)
You will output a single prompt block optimized for **Frameless Historical Evolution**:
**Prompt Structure:**
**[1. The Frameless Chrono-Composition]**

A **frameless, edge-to-edge** high-angle isometric landscape visualizing the **historical evolution of [Insert Location Name]**. The image is NOT contained in a box and shows **NO vertical cross-section**. The terrain surface **fills the entire 16:9 frame**. The composition follows a **vertical zigzagging timeline**, stacking eras from the ancient past at the bottom to the futuristic top.
**[2. The 7-Era Rising Civilization]**
The terrain transforms as it rises, showcasing the architectural history of **[Insert Location Name]**:

* **[Layer 1 - Bottom Front - The Origin]:** The immediate foreground features the ancient landscape of [Insert Location]. **Massive 3D text spelling "[Insert Location Name]" stands here**, textured like [Ancient Material]. Beside it is [Earliest Historical Landmark/Style].
* **[Layer 2 - Front Right - Early Settlement]:** The path climbs to [Describe Traditional/Dynastic Architecture of the region].
* **[Layer 3 - Mid-Left - The Transition]:** Stacked above, [Describe Pre-Industrial or Colonial Era structures].
* **[Layer 4 - Center Core - Industrial/Growth]:** A dense zone featuring [Describe Industrial Era/20th Century expansion].
* **[Layer 5 - Mid-Right Elevated - Modernization]:** Rising steeply with [Describe Modern Concrete/Glass Architecture].
* **[Layer 6 - Upper Left - The Skyline]:** [Describe Iconic Contemporary Landmarks of the region].
* **[Layer 7 - Top Peak - Future Vision]:** The highest point featuring [Futuristic/Sci-Fi interpretation of the region].
**[3. The Evolution of Life (Details)]**
Miniature figures and transport evolve as the eye moves up:
* **Bottom Layers:** [Transport & Clothing typical of the region's ancient past].
* **Middle Layers:** [Transport & Clothing typical of the region's industrial era].
* **Top Layers:** [Modern/Future Transport & Fashion].
**[4. The Branding & Atmosphere]**

**No frames, no borders, no cross-sections.** Lighting transitions from warm/historic (bottom) to cool/neon (top). The text "**[Insert Location Name]**" is grand and monolithic. Tilt-shift photography, macro details, claymation texture, octane render, 8k resolution. --no wooden base, box, frame, borders, cross-section view --ar 16:9 --stylize 750 --v 6.0
# USER INPUT
Please generate the prompt for the historical evolution of:
**Target City: [Paris]**
description_en: Using a structure of stacked film scenes, 3D miniature connected images of cities from different eras were created.
description_zh: 使用影视场景堆叠的结构，绘制了不同年代城市的3D微缩连接图片。

name: Travel Scenery Magazine Cover

场景：模特站在上海外滩江边，背景是黄浦江对岸的东方明珠塔与陆家嘴天际线，建筑群在晨曦中呈现柔和的金粉色调。江面有轻微雾气，增添朦胧感。
人物：年龄不详的女性，表情恬静内敛，眼神望向远方。身穿简约黑色高领毛衣或白色衬衫，发丝被江风轻轻吹动。中景构图，人物居中。
光线：黄金时刻柔和自然光，均匀扩散无硬阴影。高调明亮，氛围静谧都市感。
质感：轻微胶片颗粒感，色调偏暖的日系胶片风格。
杂志排版：
- 画面上部大面积留白（天空部分）

核心概念：一位穿着时尚波点连衣裙的写实女性，无缝融入细节丰富的黑白漫画背景中。她是自己卡通购物冒险中的"真实时刻"。有趣、欢快、艺术波普美学。
【左上 - 兴奋开场】
写实女性：双臂上举欢呼，手持"SALE"标牌或兴奋地向前指。快乐、睁大眼睛的表情。穿红白波点连衣裙，拎小手包。
漫画背景：黑白漫画分镜展示卡通版自己冲进商店大门，配有速度线、闪光效果和"SALE!""5折！"对话气泡。
【右上 - 抢购大战】
写实女性：身体前倾动感十足，一只手臂伸出仿佛在抓取什么，表情俏皮带竞争感。头发因动作微微飘动。
漫画背景：漫画分镜展示卡通版混乱场面——多个卡通自己争抢打折商品、衣服乱飞、戏剧性动作线、"是我的！""我先看到的！"文字气泡。
【左下 - 试衣欢乐】
写实女性：俏皮地单手叉腰摆姿势，开心大笑。可能戴着滑稽的帽子或举着一件夸张的衣服。
漫画背景：分镜展示卡通自己试穿荒谬服装——超大帽子、不搭配的图案、太紧的裙子——配有汗滴和"？？？"反应气泡。
【右下 - 现实打击】
写实女性：看着打开的钱包，表情夸张震惊搞笑，嘴巴张开，眉毛上扬。脚边堆满购物袋。
漫画背景：漫画分镜展示卡通自己钱包空空、飞出蛾子、戏剧性震惊线条、"我的钱包！""不要啊！"中文简体对话气泡，以及溢出的购物车。
风格：写实女性鲜艳色彩与黑白漫画背景形成对比。锐利细节，自然皮肤纹理，电影感光线。波普艺术与编辑摄影结合。8K画质，俏皮而有艺术感。

The left side features cold snowy winter elements, gradually thawing into the fresh green buds and blooms of spring, then morphing into the lush vibrant vegetation and bright sunlight of summer, and finally transitioning into the golden, orange, and red hues of autumn on the far right.

There are no visible dividing lines between seasons; the weather, lighting, and vegetation blend smoothly to create a unified and harmonious panorama. Rich in detail, symbolic of the passage of time, cinematic lighting, 8k resolution, highly detailed textures. --ar 4:3

name: Loss Landscape Scientific Illustration
english: A professional scientific illustration for a top-tier machine learning academic paper, figure view. A complex, highly non-convex 3D loss landscape surface rendered with a scientific color scheme (matplotlib 'magma' or 'parula' style, transitioning from deep purple blue valleys to bright yellow orange peaks). The surface features rugged terrain, saddle points, wide plateaus, and multiple sharp local minima, with one clearly deepest global minimum. Two distinct optimization trajectory lines with glowing arrows show the path of descent: one "SGD" trajectory (a noisy, oscillating red line getting stuck in a local valley) and one "Adam" trajectory (a smoother, accelerated bright cyan line finding the global minimum). The figure includes elegant wireframe axis box, scientific axis labels ($w_1$, $w_2$, Loss $\mathcal{L}$), and a clean legend. Vector graphics aesthetic, clean lines, high resolution, 4k render, isometric camera angle.

description_zh: 说明：画幅根据你自己的原图比例，例如1920*1080。

name: PPT with Gradient Realistic Glass Card Style
name_zh: 渐变拟物玻璃卡片风格
chinese: 你是一位专家级UI UX演示设计师，请生成高保真、未来科技感的16比9演示文稿幻灯片。请根据视觉平衡美学，自动在封面、网格布局或数据可视化中选择一种最完美的构图。
全局视觉语言方面，风格要无缝融合Apple Keynote的极简主义、现代SaaS产品设计和玻璃拟态风格。整体氛围需要高端、沉浸、洁净且有呼吸感。光照采用电影级体积光、柔和的光线追踪反射和环境光遮蔽。配色方案选择深邃的虚空黑或纯净的陶瓷白作为基底，并以流动的极光渐变色即霓虹紫、电光蓝、柔和珊瑚橙、青色作为背景和UI高光点缀。
关于画面内容模块，请智能整合以下元素：
1. 排版引擎采用Bento便当盒网格系统，将内容组织在模块化的圆角矩形容器中。容器材质必须是带有模糊效果的磨砂玻璃，具有精致的白色边缘和柔和的投影，并强制保留巨大的内部留白，避免拥挤。
2. 插入礼物质感的3D物体，渲染独特的高端抽象3D制品作为视觉锚点。它们的外观应像实体的昂贵礼物或收藏品，材质为抛光金属、幻彩亚克力、透明玻璃或软硅胶，形状可是悬浮胶囊、球体、盾牌、莫比乌斯环或流体波浪。
3. 字体与数据方面，使用干净的无衬线字体，建立高对比度。如果有图表，请使用发光的3D甜甜圈图、胶囊状进度条或悬浮数字，图表应看起来像发光的霓虹灯玩具。
构图逻辑参考： 如果生成封面，请在中心放置一个巨大的复杂3D玻璃物体，并覆盖粗体大字，背景有延伸的极光波浪。 如果生成内容页，请使用Bento网格布局，将3D图标放在小卡片中，文本放在大卡片中。 如果生成数据页，请使用分屏设计，左侧排版文字，右侧悬浮巨大的发光3D数据可视化图表。
渲染质量要求：虚幻引擎5渲染，8k分辨率，超细节纹理，UI设计感，UX界面，Dribbble热门趋势，设计奖获奖作品。

name: Knowledge Infographic/Flowchart
chinese: 高质量俯拍平铺摄影，打造简洁讲解太阳能工作原理的自制信息图，置于干净的浅灰色纹理背景之上。视觉叙事从左至右分清晰步骤展开，内容基于维基百科 “太阳能” 词条（****）。背景手绘简约清晰的黑色箭头，引导视线从太阳延伸至房屋，明确标注能量流动路径，中文，整体风格兼具科普性与现代感，通俗易懂。照片采用自上而下的鸟瞰视角拍摄，光线柔和均匀，最大程度减少阴影，聚焦能量转化过程。画面比例为 16:9。

现代简约风格俯拍平铺摄影，呈现艾萨克・牛顿的光与色彩理论，背景为无缝哑光浅灰色。构图沿左至右遵循精准的几何逻辑展开，所有注释采用超简洁的无衬线字体呈现。简洁的数字标签 “01”“02”“03”“04” 标记出实验的每个阶段，整体概念是对牛顿 1671 年信件中实验的现代可视化呈现，相关内容可参考链接（*****）。简体中文，整体风格兼具科学性、精准性与典雅感，照片采用自上而下的鸟瞰视角拍摄，搭配明亮均匀、无阴影的工作室灯光，营造干净的高科技视觉效果，画面比例为 16:9。
生成一个高中物理教学插图,示意图,简洁专业风格。整体科学、直观,便于学生理解。示意图内容：平抛运动轨迹与速度位移分解，需要有高台、小球、坐标系等元素，呈现小球在运动过程中的受力分析，添加所用到的物理公式和图例，使用简体中文。

name: Castle in the Sky
english: Prompt 1:

Create an ultra-HD, hyper-realistic digital poster of a floating miniature island shaped like [COUNTRY], resting on white clouds in the sky. Blend iconic landmarks, natural landscapes (like forests, mountains, or beaches), and cultural elements unique to [COUNTRY]. Carve “[COUNTRY]” into the terrain using large white 3D letters. Add artistic details like birds (native to [COUNTRY]), cinematic lighting, vivid colors, aerial perspective, and sun reflections to enhance realism. Ultra-quality, 4K+ resolution. 1080x1080 format. [COUNTRY] is 'Switzerland'.

Create an ultra-high-definition, hyper-realistic digital poster featuring a miniature island shaped like [city] floating above white clouds in the sky. Seamlessly integrate [city]'s unique iconic landmarks, natural landscapes (such as forests and mountains), and cultural elements. Carve the name of  [CITY] into the terrain using colossal white 3D letters. Add artistic details to enhance realism, including birds specific to the city, cinematic lighting, vibrant colors, an aerial perspective, and sunlight reflection effects. Ultra-high quality, 4K+ resolution. 3:4. City: Singapore

name: PPT with Vector Illustration Style
chinese: 作用：生成带有顶部矢量插图的详细信息图，所有数据和信息都会尽量用插画可视化表示。
提示词：
帮我基于这个风格要求和内容生成 PPT：
视觉风格与美术指导 (Visual Style & Art Direction)
插画风格： 扁平化矢量插画（Flat Vector Illustration）。必须包含清晰、统一粗细的黑色轮廓线（Monoline/Stroke）。色彩填涂需简洁，仅使用少量阴影，严禁使用渐变色或3D渲染效果。
构图形式： 横向全景式构图（Panoramic），占据版面顶部 1/3 的空间。
线条风格 (Line Work)： 必须使用统一粗细的黑色单线描边（Monoline/Uniform Stroke）。所有物体（建筑、植物、云朵）都必须有封闭的黑色轮廓，类似填色书的线稿风格。线条末端圆润，避免尖锐的棱角。
几何化处理 (Geometric Simplification)： 将复杂的物体简化为基本几何形状。例如，树木简化为棒棒糖形状或三角形，建筑物简化为简单的矩形块面，窗户简化为整齐的小方格网格。不要追求写实细节，要追求“玩具模型”般的可爱感。
空间与透视： 采用平视或稍微俯视的 2.5D 视角（类似等轴测，但更自由）。通过图层的前后遮挡来表现纵深，不要使用大气透视（即远景不要变模糊或变淡），所有图层清晰度一致。
装饰元素： 在空白处添加装饰性的几何元素，如放射状的线条（代表阳光或能量）、药丸形状的云朵、或者是简单的小圆点和星星，以平衡画面的视觉密度。
配色方案： 复古且柔和的色调。
背景： 米色/奶油色（Cream/Off-white）纸张纹理感底色。
强调色： 珊瑚红、薄荷绿、芥末黄、赭石色（Burnt Orange）和岩石蓝。
字体排版：
主标题： 巨大的、加粗的复古衬线体（Retro Serif），体现权威感与优雅感。
副标题： 位于矩形色块内的全大写无衬线体。
正文： 清晰易读的几何感无衬线体。
需要生成 PPT 的内容：

name: DSLR Cinematic Portrait in Swiss Winter
english: Hyper-realistic, ultra-detailed DSLR cinematic portrait of a young man (same facial identity as reference) standing outdoors in a Swiss alpine village during a winter evening. Soft snow falling. Visible frosty breath in the cold air. Hands in pockets, relaxed natural stance.
He wears a thick wool winter coat, a textured knit sweater, and a loosely wrapped scarf. Subtle accessory: silver ring.
Background: snow-covered rooftops, blurred alpine mountains, glowing chalet windows, warm village street lamps. Soft golden bokeh reflecting on fresh snow.
Lighting: cinematic winter lighting blend cool blue shadows + warm golden highlights. Rosy winter skin tones. Sharp facial detail. Shallow depth of field. Atmospheric haze.
Camera: 8K, full-frame DSLR, 85mm lens, f/1.8, ISO 100, 1/200s.
Style: editorial travel portrait, hyper-realism, high dynamic range, crisp focus, natural skin texture.

name: 3D Chibi Miniature Travel Spot
english: A 3D chibi-style miniature travel concept themed around {argument name="travel location name" default="Mount Fuji"}. At the center is a creatively designed two-story observation deck and tourist information center, built around a giant iconic {argument name="symbol of the travel location" default="symbol of the travel location"} object. Through the large glass windows, you can see the intricately detailed interior, with warm lighting and decorations based on {argument name="theme color of the travel location" default="theme color of the travel location"}. Miniature characters wearing tour guide uniforms are working inside, while visiting mini characters are taking photos and relaxing. Around the building are benches, streetlights, stone-paved walkways, and {argument name="local natural elements or plants" default="local natural elements or plants"}, expressing the unique atmosphere of the destination. It is rendered in a miniature cityscape style using Cinema 4D, with the aesthetic of a blind-box toy, rich details, and soft lighting that evokes the feeling of a relaxing travel afternoon. Please place the mini characters by referring to the attached character sheet. --ar 2:3

name: Tokyo Pop-up Atlas
english: An open hardcover atlas lies flat; a precision pop-up miniature of Tokyo rises from a laser-cut slit across the Asia map. Landmarks Shibuya Crossing, Tokyo Tower, and Sensō-ji Temple interlock with folded paper struts. White 3D ‘TOKYO’ emboss/deboss blends into pop-up platforms. Softboxes 45°/120°, polarized reflections, dynamic low angle, razor-sharp fold edges.

name: 3D Paper Cut Light Box Illustration
english: Generate an art photograph of a highly dreamy and three-dimensional 3D paper cut light box.
The paper cut theme is: {argument name="theme" default="a deer in a forest under the moonlight"}.

Layering structure and composition: Design the image as a real, physical paper cut light box composed of 5–7 layers of paper stacked together. Each layer must have its own depth of field and clear silhouette, and you should be able to see the thickness of the paper and the shadows between layers.
Core structure:
- The image should clearly present a multi-layered silhouette effect, with visible physical spacing between the paper layers.
- Overall composition is vertical 3:4, with the light box centered, leaving a bit of space at the edges, like a glowing art object placed on a table.

Depth layout: - Foreground (layers 1–2): use dark, intricate silhouettes that form a frame around the edges of the image, with elements matching the current theme, such as branches and vines for forest themes, windows and arches for city or castle themes, or rocks and coral for underwater or fantasy themes.
- Midground (layers 3–4): this holds the core subject of the theme, slightly central in the composition and taking up the main visual weight. The subject’s silhouette must be complete and not overly blocked by the foreground.
- Background (layers 5–6): use more simplified, lower-contrast silhouettes to show distant environment and structures, adding depth to the scene.

Three-dimensionality: - There must be obvious physical spacing and shadows between layers. Light should pass between the paper layers to create soft gradations of light and dark, emphasizing the paper thickness and 3D depth, so it looks like a real paper cut light box, not a flat illustration.

Light and atmosphere (backlighting): - The light source must come from the very back of the scene, shining forward through all the paper layers.
- Light passing through the cutouts in each layer should form soft volumetric light and gradually decreasing brightness and contrast from back to front.

Color gradients (auto-adapting to the theme):
If no specific color scheme is given, automatically choose a main palette and gradient that fit the theme, while keeping a soft, night-light-friendly look. For example, warm gold to cool blue-green for forest themes, teal to deep blue for underwater themes, icy blue to deep blue for winter scenes, amber to electric blue for cyber cities, candlelight gold to deep indigo for castles, or deep blue to purple with golden glows for space themes.
If the user clearly specifies a color direction or mood (such as “cool sci-fi” or “pink-blue dreamy”), follow that as the top priority while maintaining the soft backlit, soothing feeling of a night light.
Overall feel: The image should feel quiet, healing, and storybook-like, like a softly glowing bedtime story lamp, not a noisy neon poster or infographic.

Materials and details. Paper texture: - Emphasize the reality of heavy art paper: fine texture, slight visible fibers, clean sharp cut edges with visible thickness, and light that diffuses softly through the paper like a real fibrous material, not plastic or metal.

Physical light box photography feel: - Present the image as a photograph of a real light box, not a flat illustration or vector graphic. You can faintly show the light box frame (simple white or light wood) and a slightly blurred tabletop or environment.
- The lighting should feel natural, with real-lens depth of field: slightly blurred foreground, sharp midground subject, and soft background.

Detail decorations: - You may add a modest amount of tiny floating elements between paper layers to enhance space, such as tiny glowing dots, dust motes, snowflakes, bubbles, or other small particles relevant to the theme. Their number must be restrained so they only enhance atmosphere and depth without cluttering or disrupting the silhouette structure.
Technical parameters: vertical 3:4 ratio, high-resolution output.
chinese: 生成一张极具梦幻感和立体感的【3D 层叠纸雕灯箱（Paper Cut Light Box）】艺术摄影图。
纸雕的主题是：【{主题，如：月光下的森林鹿 / 海底沉船 / 赛博都市的黄昏}】。
一、分层结构与构图（Layering Logic）：请将画面设计为一个真实存在的纸雕灯箱，必须由 **5–7 层纸张** 叠加构成，每一层都有独立景深和清晰轮廓，并能看到纸张的厚度与层间的阴影。

1. 核心结构：
- 画面呈现清晰的 **Multi-layered Silhouette（多层剪影）** 效果，纸层之间有可见的物理间距。
- 整体构图为竖版 3:4，灯箱主体居中，画面边缘留出少量空间，像一件被放在桌面上的发光艺术装置。

2. 景深布局：
- 前景（第 1–2 层）：使用深色、精细的剪影结构，在画面边缘形成框景。元素需与当前主题相匹配，例如：
  · 森林 / 自然类主题：树枝、藤蔓、叶片轮廓；
  · 城市 / 城堡类主题：窗框、拱门、桥梁、栏杆、钢结构；
  · 海底 / 奇幻类主题：岩石拱门、珊瑚、残骸轮廓等。
- 中景（第 3–4 层）：为本次主题的 **核心主体**，位于画面中景偏中心区域，占据主要视觉比重。主体轮廓必须清晰完整，不可被前景结构过度遮挡。
- 远景（第 5–6 层）：用更加简化、对比更弱的剪影，表现更远处的环境与背景结构，为画面提供空间深度。

3. 立体感：
- 层与层之间要有明显的物理间距与阴影，光线在纸层之间形成柔和的明暗递进，突出纸张的厚度和 3D 深度，让画面看上去像一个真实摆放的纸雕灯箱，而不是平面插画。

二、光影与氛围（背光魔法）：1. 背光照明（Backlighting）：
- 光源必须来自画面的 **最深处 / 最后方**，从背景向前穿透所有纸层。
- 光线通过每一层纸张的镂空处形成柔和的体积光和由远及近逐渐衰减的亮度与对比。

2. 色彩渐变（根据主题自适应配色）：
在未明确指定色彩主题的情况下，请根据当前纸雕的【主题】自动选择与之匹配的主色调与渐变方案，并始终保持柔和、适合做“夜灯”观赏的整体观感。示例逻辑如下（仅为参考方向）：
- 若主题偏 **森林 / 自然 / 童话**：采用【暖金色 / 柔和月光色 → 冷蓝 / 墨绿】的渐变，营造月光穿过树林、萤火虫点亮树梢的感觉。
- 若主题偏 **海底 / 深海 / 船只 / 珊瑚**：采用【青绿 / 蓝绿 → 深蓝 / 靛蓝】的冷色渐变，光源仿佛从水面或深海能量核心透下，带一点发光浮游生物感。
- 若主题偏 **冬天 / 雪景 / 极地 / 冰晶**：采用【冰蓝 / 冷白 → 浅紫 / 深蓝】的清冷渐变，有雪夜反光、冰晶折射的安静质感。
- 若主题偏 **赛博都市 / 城市夜景 / 霓虹街道**：采用【黄昏琥珀金 / 橙色 → 电蓝 / 靛紫】的对比渐变，在建筑和招牌上点缀少量青蓝、紫粉霓虹，但保持柔和，不要刺眼。
- 若主题偏 **古堡 / 中世纪城镇 / 烛光场景**：采用【烛光金 / 暖橙 → 靛蓝 / 深紫夜空】的渐变，像远处城堡的窗户刚刚亮起。
- 若主题偏 **星空 / 宇宙 / 太空航行**：采用【深蓝 / 靛青 → 紫色 / 轻微金色光晕】的宇宙渐变，星光和星云略带金色或青紫的柔和发光。
若用户在主题中 **明确指定色彩方向或氛围**（例如“冷色科幻感”“粉蓝梦幻系”“黑金神秘感”），则以用户指定的色彩为最高优先级，在此基础上保持纸雕灯箱的柔和背光效果与治愈气质。
3. 整体观感：画面应充满静谧、治愈、童话般的感觉，像一个轻柔发光的睡前故事灯箱，而不是嘈杂刺眼的霓虹海报或信息图表风格。
三、材质与细节（Material & Details）：1. 纸张质感：强调 **高克重艺术纸** 的真实质感，纸面有细腻纹理和轻微可见的纸纤维，切割边缘干净锐利，纸层边缘有明确厚度，光线透过时形成柔和的漫反射与微弱透光，而不是塑料或金属质感。
2. 实体灯箱摄影感：画面需要呈现为 **实物灯箱的摄影作品**，而不是平面插画或数码向量风格。可以隐约看到灯箱的外框结构（如简洁的白色或浅木色框）以及轻微虚化的桌面或摆放环境。整体光感自然，带有真实镜头的景深效果：前景稍微虚化，中景主体清晰，背景柔和。
3. 细节装饰：在纸层之间可以点缀少量微小、悬浮的点状元素，用来增强空间感，例如：星点般的微光、轻微的尘埃颗粒、雪花、气泡或与主题相关的微型光点。数量必须克制，只作为氛围和空间的点缀，不得破坏整体剪影结构与层次关系，也不能让画面变得杂乱。
【技术参数示例】竖版 3:4 比例，高分辨率输出。

name: Children's Book Illustration Style for Character Drawing

description_zh: Replace [Character] with "Alice in Wonderland", "One Piece Luffy", "Naruto", or "Detective Conan"

name: Surreal Underwater Office
english: A surreal, dreamlike photograph of a complete office environment submerged deep underwater. An elegant Asian businesswoman in a sharp, tailored suit sits perfectly composed at a floating mahogany desk, typing on a laptop that glows blue. Her hair and papers float weightlessly around her head like seaweed. Schools of colorful tropical fish swim nonchalantly through the scene. Sunlight filters down from the surface far above, creating shimmering, rippling caustic light patterns on her face and the sandy office floor. The mood is eerie, calm, and impossibly beautiful.

name: Colorful Minimalist Vector Art Style Transfer
name_zh: 彩色极简矢量艺术风格转移
english: Task: Transform the provided image into a minimalist vector-style poster.
Style Guidelines:
- Overall Look: Use flat-design, geometric simplification, and minimalist vector art.
- Color Palette: Restrict to 3–6 harmonious colors with clear tonal separation. Avoid gradients, photorealistic rendering, textures, noise, and excessive detail.

- Shapes: Reduce all forms to essential geometric contours and solid shapes. Use clean, even-weight line art or optionally no outlines, depending on poster coherence. Maintain a high level of abstraction without making the subject unrecognizable.

- Lighting: Eliminate realistic lighting. Shadows and highlights should be replaced with flat color blocks or omitted entirely. Allowed effects include hard-edged shadow shapes and subtle tonal areas. Forbidden effects include soft shadows, complex reflections, or photographic highlights.
Subject Preservation:
- Maintain recognizable identity through silhouette, proportions, key facial landmarks, and essential features.
- Keep accurate relative scale for the body, head, and major elements.
- Only define the most important features for recognition. Remove fine textures, hair strands, pores, and small clothing details.
Composition:
- Keep the original crop unless otherwise specified.
- Simplify the background into 1–2 large flat color fields or abstract geometric forms. Avoid real textures, complex scenery, or photographic depth of field.
- Ensure the subject remains the focal point, with the background serving as a minimal, supportive structure.
Color and Balance:
- Aim for high clarity, bold contrast, and a legible silhouette.
- Maintain neutral white balance, avoiding warm or cool photographic shifts.
- All edges must be crisp, clean, and consistently stylized.
Output Requirements:
- Produce a flat, poster-like vector appearance (raster output is acceptable).
- Match the original image resolution unless otherwise instructed.
- Do not add text, logos, watermarks, or any elements not present in the original image.
Prohibited Changes:
- Do not alter the identity of the subject.
- Do not add new objects or remove essential ones.
- Avoid any stylization that contradicts the minimal vector aesthetic (e.g., painterly strokes, gradients, 3D shading).

Goal Summary: Create a clean, minimalist vector-style interpretation of the original image that preserves the silhouette, proportions, and essential identity, while removing all non-essential details and realistic lighting cues.

name: Cave Entrance Shape
english: An image of a [TYPE] landscape, featuring a cave entrance that is shaped exactly like the outline of a [SHAPE]. name: Travel Influencer Photo
english: You are a world-class travel influencer and art director. Analyze the input text (latitude and longitude) provided at the end, and generate an overwhelmingly stunning travel photo capable of earning "100,000 likes" on Instagram or TikTok.
The character from the attached reference image will appear as the admired traveler.
▼ Instructions for Generation Process (Thinking Process). Utilize Nano Banana Pro's reasoning capabilities to solve the following "Aesthetic Appeal" equation before drawing:
1. [Step 1: Identifying Aesthetically Pleasing Locations and Angles]:
- Identify the location from the input coordinates and select the most popular "photo spots" and "iconic compositions" on social media.
- Calculate angles (such as dynamic compositions with ultra-wide angle or drone views) that emphasize scale or create narrative by including a person, rather than just a landscape photo.
2. [Step 2: Fashion Styling Aiming for Complementary Colors]:

- Analyze the main color of the background (e.g., green for a forest, brown for a desert, blue for the sea) and select fashionable clothing in its "complementary color" (opposite color) or high-contrast colors.
- The clothing should be suitable for the "local climate" while emphasizing trendiness, such as high fashion, bohemian style, or luxury streetwear.
- Include items (sunglasses, hats, vintage cameras, local drinks, etc.) to create a natural, effortless look.
3. [Step 3: Emotional Light and Color Direction]:
- Set the time of day to "Golden Hour (golden light just before sunset)" or "Blue Hour (blue light before dawn)" to create dramatic shadows.
- Simulate color grading (color correction) to apply filters favored on social media, such as "Teal & Orange" or "Pastel Dream."
▼ Design and Style Specification

* Composition/Layout: Beautifully blur the background with shallow depth of field (Bokeh), or use a wide-angle lens (16mm) to make limbs look longer while capturing the magnificent scenery. Be mindful of the Rule of Thirds.
* Taste: A dreamy yet vivid visual creation that evokes "Wanderlust" (a craving for travel). 8k resolution, Unsplash style photography.

* Character: Maintain the facial features of the reference image while adopting attractive poses that draw in the viewer, such as an pensive look directly at the camera or a smile while turning back. Add movement by showing hair blowing in the wind.
* Text: Stylishly place the name of the location subtly but accurately spelled on signs or items within the image (if possible).
▼ Input Text:
Latitude and Longitude: {argument name="latitude and longitude" default="36.4618° N, 25.3753° E"}
description_en: Desc: to generate high-quality, viral-worthy travel photos (like those seen on Instagram or TikTok) based on provided GPS coordinates.
Preqs: Upload a photo of a person.

In the background, in an overlapping and translucent silhouette, the profile of the same woman's face appears with her eyes closed and head raised, her hair slightly tousled downward. The setting is a cloudy or overcast day, with the horizon of the sea or water stretching out. The lighting is diffuse, creating a melancholic and artistic atmosphere. The image has a vintage, grainy, and artistic touch. Face matching.

name: Deconstructed Food Poster
english: Premium Chinese noodle restaurant food poster featuring deconstructed layers of Dan Dan Noodles / Spicy Sichuan Noodles floating in vertical stack on pure black background (#000000). Seven distinct layers from top to bottom with extra spacing before the final dish:
1) Top layer: pile of bright red dried chili flakes and golden-brown Sichuan peppercorn powder
2) Second layer: light yellow crushed peanuts and vibrant green chopped scallions scattered
3) Third layer: coiled handmade alkaline noodles in pale yellow, showing clear texture and strands
4) Fourth layer: yellow bean sprouts (yacai) and bright green peas scattered - these vegetables would be placed in the bowl first

5) Fifth layer: transparent glass bowl filled with deep red spicy chili oil broth, floating chili pieces visible, glossy surface with reflections - this soup base is poured over the vegetables, so it appears BELOW the vegetables in the vertical stack
6) Sixth layer: EMPTY SPACE - a larger gap with only subtle floating oil droplets, steam wisps, and small ingredient particles drifting down, creating visual separation and breathing room

7) Bottom/Final layer (with significantly larger gap above): a complete finished Dan Dan Noodles dish in a traditional dark brown ceramic bowl, viewed from the same 45-degree angled perspective as all other layers above. The bowl contains all ingredients combined - pale yellow noodles coated in glossy red chili oil, topped with crushed peanuts, bright green chopped scallions, bean sprouts, peas, and red chili flakes sprinkled on top. The noodles look freshly mixed and glistening with oil, subtle steam rising. This finished bowl is at the same scale and viewing angle as the deconstructed ingredients above. The extra spacing above emphasizes this as the final result, creating a dramatic reveal of the transformation from separated components to complete dish.

Each layer separated with gaps revealing textures and details. Layers 1-5 have normal spacing between them. Layer 6 is an intentional empty transition space with double or triple the normal gap distance. Layer 7 (finished dish) sits at the bottom with clear visual separation. Chinese and English bilingual labels with elegant arrows pointing to each component: "辣椒油&花椒粉 Chili Oil & Sichuan Pepper Powder", "麻辣风味 Numbing & Spicy Flavor", "花生碎&葱花 Crushed Peanuts & Scallions", "手工碱面 Handmade Noodles", "芽菜&豌豆 Yacai & Peas", "丰富配料 Rich Toppings", "红油汤底 Spicy Red Broth", "成品 Finished Dish".

NO white pedestal, NO platform base. All layers float freely in space against pure black background. Dramatic studio lighting from 45-degree angle, rim lighting highlighting textures and glass bowl transparency. All layers including the finished bowl share identical lighting, perspective angle, and photorealistic quality. Subtle steam effects, oil droplets floating around layers, with more particles in the empty transition space. Star sparkle effect in bottom right corner near the finished dish. Dark moody aesthetic, luxurious commercial food photography style, ultra-realistic, highly detailed, professional restaurant advertising quality, 9:16 vertical format.
Supp: if you want to add a title on top, please add the prompt below at the beginning.

At the very top center of the composition, floating prominently above the ingredient layers, is a luxurious title label. The text reads "担担面 DAN DAN NOODLES" rendered in expressive, handwritten Chinese brush calligraphy (毛笔字) style. The lettering possesses a heavy, three-dimensional sculpted gold metal texture (金属质感) with a brushed finish, warm golden sheen, and realistic metallic reflections catching the dramatic studio lighting. It looks like forged gold brushstrokes floating in space.

name: Surreal Magic-Mirror
english: Prompt 1: Small dog, Lion heart. (Fig. 1)

A small, reddish-brown poodle with curly fur and expressive dark eyes is standing on a quiet street, looking into a puddle. In the water’s reflection, he sees a proud, majestic lion with a flowing mane. The reflection is realistically distorted by soft ripples in the puddle, giving the scene a dreamlike, metaphorical quality. The lighting is soft and natural, with a hint of golden hour. The image captures the contrast between Vin’s small size and his inner strength, courage, and determination. --ar 1:1.
Prompt 2: Small cat, Lion heart. (Fig. 2)

In a room infused with subtle magical ambience, {Reality} stands with their back to the camera, gazing intently into a slightly oversized oval magic mirror. The mirror appears realistic and physically accurate, with a natural reflective sheen and believable optical behavior, yet within its surface faint currents of mystical light and soft energy ripples flow gently, creating a subtle multicolored iridescence that blurs the line between realism and fantasy.

In the reflection, the image of {Inner_Reflection} appears—symbolic, powerful, and metaphorically resonant. While the reflection follows true mirror physics, it is surrounded by delicate stardust particles and a faint luminous halo, hinting at an inner force manifesting through the mirror.

Soft golden sunlight enters from a side window, blending naturally with the mirror’s gentle magical glow. This interplay of real-world lighting and supernatural highlights produces a dreamlike but credible visual contrast.

{Reality} and the reflected {Inner_Reflection} occupy most of the composition, with the mirror proportioned only slightly larger than the character—large enough to feel mystical, yet still realistic and grounded.
Rendered in cinematic lighting, surrealist style, ultra-detailed realism, 8K resolution, highly lifelike.
{Reality}: a small orange tabby cat
{Inner_Reflection}: a majestic, powerful lion

name: Giant People/Animals
english: Universal Prompt:

A highly detailed, photorealistic [CAMERA ANGLE, e.g., wide-angle shot, aerial shot looking down, extreme low-angle looking up] showing a colossal [DESCRIBE THE PERSON & CLOTHING] positioned in [SPECIFIC LOCATION/CITY/LANDSCAPE]. The giant is [ACTION -  INTERACTING WITH THE ENVIRONMENT, e.g., sitting on a building, stepping over a bridge]. To establish the immense scale, tiny [TINY ELEMENTS: PEOPLE, CARS, OR BOATS] are visible near their [FEET/HANDS]. The lighting is [TIME OF DAY, e.g., golden hour, midday sun].
Example 1: (Fig. 1)

A highly detailed, photorealistic extreme low angle photograph from ground level looking up, shows a colossal asian women wearing a kawaii outfit positioned in shibuya crossing. The giant is crawling on her knees reaching out and holding the top of a taxi with with her left arm. To establish the immense scale, use foreshortening from ground level showing the massive hand reaching for the taxi. The lighting is on a bright sunny day.
Example 2: (Fig. 2)

A highly detailed, photorealistic [wide-angle landscape shot showing a colossal [young woman in a summer sundress carrying a basket] positioned in [tulip fields in Amsterdam, Netherlands]. The giant is [gently using one finger to spin the blades of a historic wooden windmill]. To establish the immense scale, tiny [cyclists on the path looking like miniatures] are visible near her [sandaled feet]. The lighting is [golden hour sunset].
Example 3: (Fig. 3)

A highly detailed, photorealistic [drone shot photograph looking level] showing a colossal smiling toddler positioned in [New York Harbor at the Statue of Liberty]. The giant is [standing in the water, it has picked up and removed the statue of liberty from it's base and it's holding the statue of liberty. To establish the immense scale, tiny [ferries and Statue Cruises boats navigating around her legs] are visible near her [waist in the water]. The lighting is [clear blue sky, late morning].
Example 4: (Fig. 4)

A highly detailed, photorealistic [aerial helicopter photograph looking down] photograph showing a colossal [man wearing a yellow rain poncho] positioned at [Horseshoe Falls, Niagara Falls, Canada/USA border]. The giant is [kneeling in the river above the falls, cupping his massive hands to catch the rushing water as it goes over the edge to take a drink]. To establish the immense scale, the tiny ["Maid of the Mist" tourist boat looking like a bath toy] is visible in the foamy water below near his [hands]. The lighting is [misty morning light creating rainbows].
Example 5: (Fig. 5)

A highly detailed, photorealistic [distant eye-level photograph from a rooftop] photograph showing a colossal [ginger tabby cat] positioned in [a dense residential neighborhood in Kyoto, Japan]. The giant feline is [curled up asleep, its body sprawled across the roofs of four different houses, crushing tiles]. To establish the immense scale, tiny [pedestrians on bicycles and standard electrical utility poles] are visible near its [twitching ear and whiskers]. The lighting is [soft, warm late afternoon sun].
Example 6: Giant Feet (Fig. 6)

Universal Prompt: A cinematic, photorealistic forced perspective photograph from a low angle, capturing the enormous legs of a person wearing [specific detailed footwear and pants] stepping firmly into a real-world [location name or type]. Tiny photorealistic inhabitants and vehicles are dwarfed below the giant soles. The environment is highly textured and detailed, not toy-like.

Prompt instance: A photorealistic photograph from a low angle, showing the enormous legs of a person wearing dark selvedge denim jeans and worn leather Red Wing boots. They are mid-stride, stepping over a busy intersection in Midtown Manhattan, NYC. One giant boot is planted on the asphalt, completely spanning 5th Avenue. Below, dozens of tiny, photorealistic yellow taxis and real people in business suits are dwarfed, some looking up in shock, others frozen mid-commute. Steam rises from tiny subway grates next to the giant sole. The surrounding skyscrapers show detailed reflections of the giant legs. It is an overcast afternoon.
chinese: 中文实例：(图1)
这是一张高度写实、极低角度拍摄的地面仰拍照片，展现了巨型的（人物名字）出现在街头的十字路口。这位（人物名字）跪在地上，伸出左臂抓住一辆出租车的车顶。为了凸显其巨大的体型，画面运用了透视缩短法，突出了他伸向出租车的巨手。拍摄当天阳光明媚，光线明亮。

name: Financial Sankey Diagram
english: [Subject]: A professional financial Sankey diagram visualizing the Income Statement of a major corporation, in the style of "App Economy Insights" and US corporate financial reports.
[Visual Style]: High-fidelity vector infographic, clean minimalist aesthetic, flat design. The background is a clean, very light grey or off-white.

[Color Strategy - CRITICAL]: Analyze the [Insert Brand Name Here] logo. Extract its primary brand color (e.g., if Nvidia use neon green, if Meta use blue, if Tesla use red). Use this primary color as the dominant theme for the main revenue flows and profit blocks.

Create a harmonious color palette based on this primary color: use saturated shades for the vertical nodes (bars) and semi-transparent, lighter opacity gradients for the flowing paths to ensure a cohesive and professional look. Avoid clashing colors.

[Composition & Structure]: Flow: A horizontal flow from Left (Revenue Sources) to Right (Net Profit). Texture: The connecting paths (flows) must appear "silky smooth" with elegant Bezier curves, looking like liquid ribbons, not jagged lines. Iconography: On the left side (Revenue sources), include specific, minimalist flat vector icons representing the business segments (e.g., a car icon for automotive, a cloud icon for services, a chip icon for hardware).
Branding: Place the official [Insert Brand Name Here] logo clearly at the top center or near the central revenue bar.

[Details]: High resolution, 4k, sharp typography (sans-serif), professional data visualization layout. The chart clearly distinguishes between Revenue, Gross Profit, Operating Expenses, and Net Profit.
description_en: Upload Meituan's Q3 financial report. Replace "[Insert Brand Name Here]" with "Meituan"
description_zh: Upload Meituan's Q3 financial report. Replace "[Insert Brand Name Here]" with "Meituan"
